short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Twitter home feed while keeping posting and notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Feed for Twitter - Keep the productive, skip the scroll
This extension transforms your Twitter experience by maintaining what matters while eliminating the endless feed. Access your essential Twitter functions:

Post your own tweets and updates
Stay connected with notifications and mentions
Zero distractions - home feed is hidden completely

Perfect for professionals and creators who need to maintain an active Twitter presence without getting pulled into the endless scroll. Post, engage with responses, and get notifications without the temptation to browse.
Take control of your social media habits while staying connected. This extension keeps Twitter as a communication tool rather than a time sink."
Would you like me to adjust the tone or emphasize different aspects of your extension? I can also help craft a shorter version if you need one for different store listing sections.
